text: Zvi Zamir () (born Zvicka Zarzevsky; 3 March 1925 – 2 January 2024) was a Polish-born Israeli major general in the Israel Defense Forces.Profile of Zvi Zamir He was the director of the Mossad from 1968 to 1974. During his time as Mossad director, he oversaw the country's response to the Munich massacre and the Yom Kippur War. He was also a businessman and was CEO of BAZAN Group in the 1970s. Zamir was born in Łódź, Poland. He moved to the British Mandate of Palestine when he was seven months old. Zamir died on 2 January 2023 in Tel Aviv, Israel at the age of 98.Zvi Zamir, Mossad director during Yom Kippur War, dies at 98 ==References== ==Other websites== * Itamar Eichner, Mossad chief in Yom Kippur War: Tell CIA No. 2 to kiss my ass, Ynetnews, December 17, 2019 Category:1925 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Israeli generals Category:People from Łódź Category:Mossad people Category:Politicians from Tel Aviv Category:Israeli businesspeople
title: Zvi Zamir
